an8.23:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
an8.23:1.3: “sattahi, bhikkhave, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgataṃ hatthakaṃ āḷavakaṃ dhāretha.
an8.23:1.12: imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgataṃ hatthakaṃ āḷavakaṃ dhārethā”ti.
an8.23:1.14: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
an8.23:2.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena hatthakassa āḷavakassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
an8.23:2.2: Atha kho hatthako āḷavako yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho hatthakaṃ āḷavakaṃ so bhikkhu etadavoca:
an8.23:3.1: “Sattahi kho tvaṃ, āvuso, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato.
an8.23:3.10: Imehi kho tvaṃ, āvuso, sattahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato”ti.
an8.23:3.11: “Kaccittha, bhante, na koci gihī ahosi odātavasano”ti?
an8.23:3.12: “Na hettha, āvuso, koci gihī ahosi odātavasano”ti.
an8.23:3.13: “Sādhu, bhante, yadettha na koci gihī ahosi odātavasano”ti.
an8.23:4.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu hatthakassa āḷavakassa nivesane piṇḍapātaṃ gahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
an8.23:4.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an8.23:5.1: “Idhāhaṃ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena hatthakassa āḷavakassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃ; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdiṃ.
an8.23:5.2: Atha kho, bhante, hatthako āḷavako yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an8.23:5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, hatthakaṃ āḷavakaṃ etadavacaṃ:
an8.23:5.4: ‘sattahi kho tvaṃ, āvuso, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato.
an8.23:5.13: Imehi kho tvaṃ, āvuso, sattahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato’ti.
an8.23:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, bhante, hatthako maṃ etadavoca:
an8.23:6.2: ‘kaccittha, bhante, na koci gihī ahosi odātavasano’ti?
an8.23:6.3: ‘Na hettha, āvuso, koci gihī ahosi odātavasano’ti.
an8.23:6.4: ‘Sādhu, bhante, yadettha na koci gihī ahosi odātavasano’”ti.
an8.23:7.3: Santeyeva attani kusaladhamme na icchati parehi ñāyamāne.
an8.23:7.4: Tena hi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, imināpi aṭṭhamena acchariyena abbhutena dhammena samannāgataṃ hatthakaṃ āḷavakaṃ dhārehi, yadidaṃ appicchatāyā”ti.
